name: Book Tracker
description: What is ULTIMATE LIBRARY:The book tracker Notion template is a useful tool for avid readers who want to keep track of their reading progress. With this template, users can log important details about the books they've read, such as the title, author, and date finished. They can also rate the book, leave a review, and set reading goals to help them stay on track. Overall, the book tracker Notion template is a great organizational tool for book lovers.How to use BOOK TRACKER:The Ultimate Library N
features: Book needs review; Book templates; Quick capture
